item.title: Compliance as code
item.description: Vagrant Tutorial This is a page about getting started with vagrant and Ansible. TechStack Vagrant Virtual box Ansible Requirements Install virtualbox Install vagrant Install git Restart the computer Lab 1 Start a virtual server with vagrant Creating folder Open git bash Create a folder and navigate to it mkdir /c/vagrant-lab; cd /c/vagrant-lab Creating Vagrantfile In that folder execute $ vagrant init centos/7 A `Vagrantfile` has been placed in this directory.
